name: Ritual Beast Ulti-Gaiapelio
effectText:
1 "Ritual Beast Ulti" monster + 1 "Ritual Beast Tamer" monster + 1 "Spiritual Beast" monster
Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. If Summoned this way, this card gains this effect.
‚óèWhen a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Ritual Beast" card from your hand; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
